statements: DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1 AND institution = 'ABC University';
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' AND research_area = 'Biology';
DELETE FROM Nutrient_Content WHERE researcher_id = 100 AND nutrient_name = 'Iron';
DELETE FROM Nutrient_Content WHERE nutrient_name = 'Vitamin C' AND nutrient_amount < 50;
DELETE FROM Water_Usage WHERE id = 100 AND research_id = 1;
DELETE FROM gas_emissions WHERE researcher_id = 3 AND gas_type = 'CO2';
DELETE FROM Water_Usage WHERE water_source = 'River' AND water_amount >= 100.00
